{{Marvel Database:Team Template | Image = Victor Creed Clones (Romulus) (Earth-616) from Wolverine Vol 2 310 001.jpg | Name = Unknown | EditorialNames = | Title = [[Victor Creed (Earth-616)|Sabretooth]]'s [[Glossary:Clone|Clones]] | Aliases = [[The Beast]]{{r|Wolverine Vol 3 55}} | Status = Defunct | Identity = Secret | Reality = Earth-616 | BaseOfOperations = Formerly [[Weapon X Facility]], [[Alberta]], [[Canada]]. | Leaders = Formerly [[Romulus (Earth-616)|Romulus]] | CurrentMembers = | FormerMembers = Several killed by [[James Howlett (Earth-616)|Wolverine]] | Allies = [[Romulus (Earth-616)|Romulus]], [[Victor Creed (Earth-616)|Sabretooth]], [[Kyle Gibney (Earth-616)|Wild Child]] | Enemies = [[James Howlett (Earth-616)|Wolverine]] | Origin = [[Glossary:Clone|Clones]] of [[Victor Creed (Earth-616)|Sabretooth]] created by [[Romulus (Earth-616)|Romulus]] | PlaceOfFormation = [[Weapon X Facility]], [[Alberta]], [[Canada]] | PlaceOfDissolution = [[Weapon X Facility]], [[Alberta]], [[Canada]] | Creators = Jeph Loeb; Simone Bianchi | First = Wolverine Vol 3 54 | First2 = {{g|Original Sabretooth's clone}}
{{sld|Wolverine Vol 2 310}}{{g|Several other clones}} | Last = Wolverine Vol 2 310 | HistoryText = This army of [[Glossary:Clone|Clones]] of [[Victor Creed (Earth-616)|Victor Creed]] a.k.a. [[Sabretooth]] was created by [[Romulus (Earth-616)|Romulus]] with the intent of use them to substitute the real Sabretooth in his missions.{{r|Wolverine Vol 2 310}} The first clone who appeared was believed to be the real Sabretooth; he was brutally killed by [[James Howlett (Earth-616)|Wolverine]] in the forests of [[Alberta]], [[Canada]].{{r|Wolverine Vol 3 54|55}} This clone's soul later appeared to Wolverine in [[Hell]].{{r|Wolverine: Road to Hell Vol 1 1}}{{r|Wolverine Vol 4 2|5}} The entire army of clones appeared in the [[Weapon X Facility]] when Logan and Romulus' sister, [[Remus (Earth-616)|Remus]], were searching for Romulus to kill him; while the real Sabretooth escaped, the other clones were all killed in the battle.{{r|Wolverine Vol 2 310}} | Equipment = | Transportation = | Weapons = | Notes = * Not to be confused with the [[Victor Creed (Earth-616)|Sabretooth]]'s [[Victor Creed Clones (Sinister) (Earth-616)|Clones]] created by [[Nathaniel Essex (Earth-616)|Mister Sinister]]. | Trivia = | Links = }} [[Category:Clones of Victor Creed]]
